t: Definition: "Damaged" Terms | Amazon & Marketplace SOPs
s: Carrier Damaged refers to a product that is either: (a) damaged during transit or delivery to an Amazon customer; or (b) damaged during return transit or delivery to an Amazon fulfillment center following a customer return. Customer Damaged refers to a product that has been returned by a customer ...
